detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract EashToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#101-224) has payable functions:
	 - EashToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#213-215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description: Variable EashToken._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#107) is not in mixedCase

EashToken.EashToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#116-123) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 1000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#120)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#45)
	- EashToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#129-131)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#46)
	- EashToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#137-139)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#47)
	- EashToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#192-194)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- EashToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#147-152)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#48)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- EashToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#163-167)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#49)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Owned.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#85-87)

acceptOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Owned.acceptOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#88-93)

fallback() should be declared external:
	- EashToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EashToken.sol#213-215)
